name: Got a Warrant?
description:
This game will become a swat tactics simualtor ( or Close Quarters Combat simulator ) in 2D! It will feature many weapons and equipment to choose from before deploying to a randomly generated house/appartment, where the bad guys hide. The game will also include support for multiplayer and co-op gameplay!

The game is currently in development and is a prototype. Many of the main features aren't in the game yet as it is a in a very early stage of development. 

You may donate some money when you download the game as it would help me a lot while developing it!
